qti-content-body.p: Correct! The expression 2+2+2+2+2 represents adding 2 five times, which is shown by 5 rows of 2 dots.
Not quite. The expression 2+2+2+2+2 means we have 5 groups of 2. The correct image should show 5 rows with 2 dots in each row.
